short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Moves the comments section on YouTube videos to the right sidebar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a browser extension that allows you to view comments and videos simultaneously on the YouTube website. 

- HOW TO USE
1. Go to the YouTube video page.
2. Click the extension icon and then click the refresh button.
3. You can move/cancel comments to the right by pressing on/off.

It does not work on small screens.
